title: Giving Encouragement to Your Spouse
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Larry Crabb
itunes:summary: When your spouse lets you down, how do you respond? We all make mistakes, and need a healing dose of God's grace from time to time. John and the Smalleys talk about how to encourage your spouse, even when he or she disappoints you. Receive the book Fully Alive with your gift of any amount!
